trans-unit.source: Associates an action taken on an activity designer on the workflow design surface with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
This class cannot be inherited.
A designer action is a user action that is performed when you activate a designer glyph on the workflow design surface.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> class is used to indicate your actions.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> class is also used to add the task items by the adornment service.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> class by using an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, an integer, and a string.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on which the designer action is taken.
An integer value that represents the identifier of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
A string that represents the text associated with the designer action.
activityDesigner contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
text contains a null reference (`Nothing`) or its length is 0.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> class by using <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, an integer, a string, and an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on which the designer action is to appear.
An integer value that represents the identifier of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
A string that represents the text associated with the designer action.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be associated with the designer action.
activityDesigner contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
text contains a null reference (`Nothing`) or its length is 0.
Gets the identifier for the designer action.
An integer that represents the identifier for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> object.
Gets the image associated with the designer action.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.

Invokes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction)"></xref> method of the activity designer associated with the current designer action.

The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction%2A> method is called when you click a validation error displayed by the activity designer on the workflow design surface.
Represents the name of the property that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> is associated with.

In the property editor, the property that corresponds to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.PropertyName%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> provides a visual cue that signals the presence of an associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the name of the property.
Gets the text associated with the designer action.
A string value that represents the text associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
Gets a dictionary of user data associated with the designer action.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> that represents the user data associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
